title: quarkus.rest.jackson.optimization.enable-reflection-free-serializers=true fails native build of StartStopTS microprofile application
body:
### Describe the bug

As suggested in https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/42506#issuecomment-2311076936 I tried to run RSS check with `quarkus.rest.jackson.optimization.enable-reflection-free-serializers=true` added to the sample microprofile application (https://github.com/rsvoboda/quarkus-startstop/tree/reactive-jackson-and-health/app-full-microprofile).

Unfortunately, native image build fails when this property is added. I'm using `mvn -f app-full-microprofile clean package -Dnative -Dquarkus.version=999-SNAPSHOT -Dquarkus.rest.jackson.optimization.enable-reflection-free-serializers=true` command.

Native compilation has issue with https://github.com/rsvoboda/quarkus-startstop/blob/reactive-jackson-and-health/app-full-microprofile/src/main/java/com/example/quarkus/serialization/dto/NestedInterface.java. Native compilation without enable-reflection-free-serializers property works well.

Message from the build:
`Caused by: com.oracle.graal.pointsto.constraints.UnsupportedFeatureException: Discovered unresolved method during parsing: com.example.quarkus.serialization.dto.NestedInterface.getCharacter(). This error is reported at image build time because class com.example.quarkus.serialization.dto.NestedInterface$quarkusjacksonserializer is registered for linking at image build time by command line and command line.`


### Expected behavior

Native image get properly produced.

### Actual behavior

Native image build fails

### How to Reproduce?

```
sdk use java 21.0.2-graalce
git clone https://github.com/rsvoboda/quarkus-startstop -b reactive-jackson-and-health
mvn -f app-full-microprofile clean package -Dnative -Dquarkus.version=999-SNAPSHOT -Dquarkus.rest.jackson.optimization.enable-reflection-free-serializers=true
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macOS

### Output of `java -version`

Java 21

### Quarkus version or git rev

Quarkus main

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
